meanings.definition: A plane figure with at least three straight sides and angles, and typically five or more.
meanings.sent1: I drew a colorful polygon in my math class today.
meanings.sent2: The playground had a large polygon painted on the ground for hopscotch.
meanings.sent3: The polygon on the flag looked like a happy little house.
meanings.sent4: Her smile formed a perfect polygon of joy on her face.
meanings.sent5: The polygon-shaped cake was a hit at the party.

meanings.definition: A closed plane figure bounded by straight sides.
meanings.sent1: The garden had a beautiful polygon of flowers in full bloom.
meanings.sent2: The map showed a polygon marking the boundaries of the national park.
meanings.sent3: The polygon of books on the shelf toppled over like dominoes.
meanings.sent4: His words formed a protective polygon around her heart.
meanings.sent5: The fence created a secure polygon around the backyard.
